alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 2:18PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern White Pine, south central Elko and east central Eureka Counties through 245 PM PDT... At 217 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Garden Pass, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern White Pine, south central Elko and east central Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM PDT for north central and northeastern Nevada.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
